original_text: Let the thief no longer steal, but rather let him labor, doing honest work with his own hands, so that he may have something to share with anyone in need.
korean_text: 도둑질하는 자는 다시 도둑질하지 말고 돌이켜 가난한 자에게 구제할 수 있도록 자기 손으로 수고하여 선한 일을 하라

sentences.original_text: Let the thief no longer steal
doing honest work with his own hands
so that he may have something to share with anyone in need
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 궁핍한 자에게 나눠 줄 것을 갖게 하려 함이라
